description: React component for the top navigation bar of a web application, providing global actions such as export, theme toggle, and user sign-in/sign-out controls.

methods.name: TopNav({ user, onSignIn, onSignOut, onToggleTheme, theme })
methods.description: React functional component rendering the top navigation bar with actions such as export, theme toggle, and user authentication controls.

methods.name: doExport
methods.description: Asynchronous handler function that triggers the export of the project, generating a downloadable JSON file.

ctags.name: TopNav
ctags.pattern: /^export function TopNav({ user, onSignIn, onSignOut, onToggleTheme, theme }) {$/
